entries.med_fail: You cannot meditate in your current condition.
entries.powerboost_begin: [meditation] You focus your mental energies into your physical form.
entries.powerboost_wane: [meditation] You feel the effects of your mental focus begin to wane.
entries.powerboost_end: [meditation] You feel the effects of mental focus come to an end.
entries.forceofwill: Via supreme fortitude, you return from the brink of unconsciousness.
entries.forceofwill_fail: You must be incapacitated to perform that command.
entries.forceofwill_unsuccessful: You are unable to keep yourself centered, and become lost in unconsciousness.
entries.powerboost_fail: You must be meditating to perform that command.
entries.powerboost_active: [meditation] You are unable to channel your energies any further.
entries.powerboost_mind: [meditation] You currently lack the mental capacity to focus your energies.
entries.forceofwill_lost: You have already expired your opportunity for forced recapacitation.
entries.forceofwill_unavailable: Force of Will is unavailable for %TO
entries.forceofwill_crit_fail: You strain to bring yourself back to consciousness.
entries.forceofwill_marginal: A strong sense of fatigue overcomes you as you return to consciousness.
entries.forceofwill_normal: You recapacitate with a marginal grogginess.
entries.forceofwill_exceptional: Through precise focus and concentration, you recapacitate with nominal side effects.
entries.must_be_meditating: You must be meditating to activate the power boost ability.
entries.state_prevent_powerboost: Your psychological state prevents use of /powerboost at this time
entries.mind_pool_too_low: Your mind pool is too low to /powerboost right now
